SEARCH

Class ParseTools

java.lang.Object
ParseTools
public class ParseTools extends Object
ParseTools class contains all the tools related to grammars such as Firstk, Followk, Firstk(alphaFollowk(A)), LL(k) definition and LL(1) action table.

    • getFirstKSets

      public Map<Symbol,Set<Symbol>> getFirstKSets()

    • firstK

      private Set<Symbol> firstK(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, int k, List<Symbol> stringList)
      Computes Firstk(X) = Firstk(X1) ⊙k Firstk(X2) ⊙k ... ⊙k Firstk(Xn)
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      k - The parameter k
      stringList - The list of strings where X is a list (X1, X2, ..., Xn)
      Returns:
      First(X) set

    • followK

      private Set<Symbol> followK(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, int k, Symbol A, List<Symbol> beta)
      Computes Followk(X) = Firstk(beta) ⊙k Followk(A)
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      k - The parameter k
      A - The variable
      beta - The list of strings
      Returns:
      Followk(X) set

    • firstKAlphaFollowKA

      private Set<Symbol> firstKAlphaFollowKA(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, int k, List<Symbol> stringList)
      Computes Firstk(αFollowk(A))
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      k - The parameter k
      stringList - The list of strings
      Returns:
      Firstk(X) set

    • constructFirstKSets

      private Map<Symbol,Set<Symbol>> constructFirstKSets(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, int k)
      Computes the First sets using First sets algorithm
      foreach A → X1 X2 ... Xn ∈ P do :
      Firstk(A) ← Firstk(A) ∪ (Firstk(X1) ⊙k Firstk(X2) ⊙k ... ⊙k Firstk(Xn))
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      k - The parameter k in Firstk
      Returns:
      The First sets

    • constructFollowKSets

      private Map<Symbol,Set<Symbol>> constructFollowKSets(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, int k)
      Computes the Follow sets using Follow sets algorithm
      foreach A → αBβ ∈ P do :
      Followk(B) ← Followk(B) ∪ (Firstk(β) ⊙k Followk(A))
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      k - The parameter k in Followk
      Returns:
      The Follow sets

    • occurrencesRules

      private List<List<Integer>> occurrencesRules(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar)
      Computes the rules with same left hand side in the context-free grammar
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      Returns:
      The list of rules with same left hand side

    • isGrammarLLK

      public boolean isGrammarLLK(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, int k)
      Checks that the grammar is LL(k) using the definition of Strong LL(K) :

      FirstK(alphaFollowK(A)) for all pairs of rules A -> alpha
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      k - The parameter k in LL(k)
      Returns:
      true if this grammar is LL(k)

    • constructLL1ActionTable

      public String[][] constructLL1ActionTable(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar)
      Constructs the LL(1) action table from a context free grammar
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      Returns:
      The action table

    • writeFirstKSets

      public void writeFirstKSets(String filePath)
      Writes the Firstk sets in a file
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where the Firstk sets will be printed

    • writeFollowKSets

      public void writeFollowKSets(String filePath)
      Writes the Followk sets in a file
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where the Followk sets will be printed

    • writeFirstKAlphaFollowKA

      public void writeFirstKAlphaFollowKA(String filePath)
      Writes the Firstk(alphaFollow(A)) sets in a file
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file where the Firstk(alphaFollow(A)) sets will be printed

    • writeActionTable

      public void writeActionTable(ContextFreeGrammar contextFreeGrammar, String filePath)
      Writes the action table in a file
      Parameters:
      contextFreeGrammar - The context-free grammar
      filePath - The path to the file where the action table will be printed
